```tsx
import React from "react";
import { IonContent, IonList, IonItem, IonLabel, IonInput } from "@ionic/react";

function Example() {
  return (
    <IonContent>
      <IonList>
        <IonItem>
          <IonLabel>Hello world</IonLabel>
        </IonItem>
        <IonInput />
      </IonList>
    </IonContent>
  );
}

export default Example;
```
